FuncDef: This command configures a range of VLANs on an access port that are to be managed by an existing management VPLS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the VLAN start value and VLAN end value. The end-vlan must be greater than start-vlan. The format is <start-vlan>-<end-vlan>. Values-start-vlan: 0 to 4094
end-vlan: 0 to 4094.
